subject: How to test without returning any return value.
msgSnippet: Dear All, How to test JunitTestcase without returning any return value such as String,object or boolean. java code: public void Option() { } doesn t return any
messageBody:
Dear All,

How to test JunitTestcase without returning any
return value such as String,object or boolean.

java code:
public void Option()
{
}
doesn't return any return value.But is checking
business condition within the method.

I will appreciate ur help.Give some resolution.

Cheers,
Kavitha
